Class ArabicToRomanGUI.RomanHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ArabicToRomanGUI.RomanHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.DocumentListener
    Enclosing class:
    ArabicToRomanGUI

    private class ArabicToRomanGUI.RomanHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.event.DocumentListener
    Implements a custom DocumentEvent handler for any time roman box is modified by the user
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Zach Swanson

      • handleChange

        public void handleChange(javax.swing.text.Document doc)
        Makes sure the roman box is being used as input, not output. If so, calls calculateArabic. Called by changedUpdate, insertUpdate, removeUpdate
        Parameters:
        doc - Document from object that triggered DocumentEvent

      • calculateArabic

        private java.lang.String calculateArabic(java.lang.String roman)
                                  throws java.util.InputMismatchException
        Calculates arabic equivalent to this roman numeral
        Parameters:
        roman - numeral to convert
        Returns:
        arabic equivalent as string
        Throws:
        java.util.InputMismatchException - Invalid roman numeral
